title: The Youthful Lariat - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life
author: Takamaru Semikawa   蝉川タカマル
description: This is the story of Tsukishima, the craziest man in all of Japan, along with Miyamoto who’s a cowardly guy, who likes following him and being told what to do, and there’s Nagase, a teenage girl who does whatever she pleases for herself. These three are very close to each other as good friends. Although, there’s someone with a unrequited love for someone among the three. This is from the teenage girl who gives it her all in her power, 120%!>
